entry.title: Taskimo Branding
entry.summary: Taskimo offers wearable digital solutions for augmented frontline workers. Enabling frontline…
entry.content:
Taskimo offers wearable digital solutions for augmented frontline workers. Enabling frontline workers to reach contextual data on-the-job while having hands-free using wearables and mobile computers.

We designed a modular brand identity system that changes shape, color and position in an analytical way to resemble Taskimo's revolutionary approach. 

WORKS is a full-featured wearable workflow management platform to author, publish and follow-up digital instructions, SOPs, checklists, on-the-job training materials and user guides for the use of frontline workers.

TIPS is a mobile knowledge base that your staff or customers refer to when a quick tip or guidance is needed for a standard operating procedure (SOP), a product, equipment or, service.

taskimo.com

entry.title: Cotto Branding
entry.summary: Cotto Gastro Italiano is the new artsy Italian restaurant in Suadiye…
entry.content:
Cotto Gastro Italiano is the new artsy Italian restaurant in Suadiye / Istanbul. Located in the most lively and local part of the city, Cotto is somewhere to be in a special day, or make the day special. 

We have been asked to create a brand identity which reflects an italian style artisan cousine. Serves not as only a restaurant but also a cafe, a winery and a charcuterie. 

Our client had a specific audience they wanted to target, had a great network of chefs and determined the energy and sources to create a place for people to have good food, meet real people and tell great stories. 

The name Cotto -means "cooked" in italian. So we combined terracotta colors with a deep green in an Art Deco style typography. Aiming to set a mood for the customers before they even get in.

Besides the brand identity, we designed the printed material and the decorative approach.

cottogastro on instagram

entry.title: Egella Group Branding
entry.summary: EGELLA Group is Dubai, UAE based, specialized in sourcing and sale…
entry.content:
EGELLA Group is Dubai, UAE based, specialized in sourcing and sale of a diversified portfolio of products and represents an array of worldwide manufacturers of agricultural, dairy and other food products such as fresh fruits, vegetables, dried fruits, cheese, olives and oils, honey as well as non-food products like home cleaners, personal care and leather care.

We've been asked to create a brand identity and a website for their business. They have the expertise to source a wide range of products to and from anywhere. To symbolize this, we designed the logo in a circular motion completed with an e shape. 

We've been asked to design a website for them to separate from the competition and tell brand's story in a fluent and compact way. We maintain the circular motion throughout the website, created videos and animated content to visualize the company's vision and information.

egellagroup.com

entry.title: Tricore Academy Branding
Coralia Liveaboard Branding
entry.summary: Coralia is a classic Phinisi that’s built in Bira, Sulawesi by the…
entry.content:
Coralia is a classic Phinisi that’s built in Bira, Sulawesi by the Konjo tribe that has been building cargo ships for centuries.

Coralia is a project by Papua Explorers that have been renown for exceptional service quality and commitment to protecting the nature while developing local communities in Raja Ampat.

www.coralia-liveaboard.com
